message: Bob, it's a pleasure to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. Given its unique nature and significant worth, I'm offering it to you for $1,300,000.
I appreciate the unique nature of the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900,000. I'm willing to pay a fair price, but I'm not sure I can go as high as $1,300,000.

Bob, I understand your position, but the value of this product is truly significant.  I'm willing to come down slightly to $1,150,000. This reflects its inherent worth while still offering you a competitive edge.
I appreciate your willingness to come down to $1,150,000, but I'm still not comfortable with that price. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $1,025,000. This is as high as I'm willing to go.
